title: URL Parser
description: Implement a URL parser that extracts components (protocol, host, port, path, query parameters, fragment) from a URL string.
requirements: Returns object with: protocol, host, port, path, query, fragment
Query should be parsed into key-value object
Port defaults to null if not specified
Handle URLs with and without protocol
Handle special characters in query params

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function to parse query parameters from a query string.
Implement a function to split a string by a delimiter.
Parse an email address into its components.
